column4: Oh man, Installed Gentoo (total linux newbie here) and the 1st time around (with days and days of compile time) I didn't know what modules I needed, so I skipped them thinking (as the docs said) I'd get what modules autoloaded like the livecd.... but nope. When I finally had a friend tell me to try 'lsmod' it saved the day... but now I've got it running, and I like gnome, but installing anything is just too much for me, and I've spent days going ove
I am using hoary because I have pretty new hardware
